oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A family leaves their home by canoe during the May 2010 flood in Bellevue
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A family escapes from their home by canoe during the May 2010 flood in Bellevue.
Forms part of the Nashville Room Flood 2010 Digital History Project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Flood damage;Natural disasters--Nashville (Tenn.);Floods--Nashville (Tenn.);Rescue work;Volunteer response--Nashville (Tenn.);Evacuation of civilians
